listitem.para: Outputs TRUE if there are no more characters to be read in the read stream file, FALSE otherwise.

listitem.programlisting:
OPENWRITE "dummy.fil SETWRITE "dummy.fil PRINT "Hello PRINT [Good Bye] SETWRITE [] CLOSE "dummy.fil
OPENREAD "dummy.fil SETREAD "dummy.fil REPEAT 2 [SHOW READLIST SHOW EOFP] [Hello] false [Good Bye] true SETREAD [] CLOSE "dummy.fil
